```{r setup, include=FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(knitr, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(tidyr, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(ggplot2, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(keyringr, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(redcapAPI, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(REDCapR, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
library(lubridate, warn.conflicts = F, quietly = T)
#Create path to and api link to RedCaps
credential_label <- "beach_api"
credential_path <- paste(Sys.getenv("USERPROFILE"), '\\DPAPI\\passwords\\', Sys.info()["nodename"], '\\', credential_label, '.txt', sep="")
uri <- "https://redcap.ctsi.ufl.edu/redcap/api/"
beach_token<-decrypt_dpapi_pw(credential_path)
```

```{r variable selection, include=FALSE}
# Create connections
rcon <- redcapConnection(url=uri, token=beach_token)
# variables
desired_fields=c("test_id","mom3t_hispanic",

# pull data
ds <- data.frame(desired_fields)
dat<- redcap_read(
  batch_size=300,
  records= participants.records.v1,
  redcap_uri = uri, 
  token      = beach_token, 
  fields     = desired_fields
)$data
head(dat)
```

```{r variable selection, include=FALSE}

dat.f=dat %>%
  select(-redcap_event_name,-redcap_repeat_instrument,-redcap_repeat_instance) %>%
  mutate(hispanic = recode(mom3t_hispanic, 
                                 "0"="Unchecked","1"="No, I am not Hispanic or Latino","2"="Yes, I am Hispanic or Latino"),
         American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Mom = recode(mom3t_race___1, 
                                  "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         Asian_Mom  = recode(mom3t_race___2,
                               "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         Black_or_African_American_Mom    = recode(mom3t_race___3, 
                                  "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         Pacific_Islander_Mom = recode(mom3t_race___4, 
                               "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         White_Mom    = recode(mom3t_race___5, 
                                "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         mom3t_baby_sex    = recode(mom3t_baby_sex, 
                                    "1"="Male","2"="Female"),
         mom3t_baby_hispanic    = recode(mom3t_baby_hispanic, 
                                         "0"="Unchecked","1"="No, I am not Hispanic or Latino","2"="Yes, I am Hispanic or Latino"),
         American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Baby    = recode(mom3t_baby_race___1,
                                       "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         Asian_Baby    = recode(mom3t_baby_race___2, 
                                       "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         Black_or_African_American_Baby    = recode(mom3t_baby_race___3, 
                                       "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         Pacific_Islander_Baby    = recode(mom3t_baby_race___4, 
                                       "0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"),
         White_Baby    = recode(mom3t_baby_race___5, 
"0"="Unchecked","1"="Checked"))%>%
  
  distinct()
```



```{r , warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
 hispanic <- dat.f %>%
  filter(hispanic == "Yes, I am Hispanic or Latino")

Not_hispanic <- dat.f %>%
  filter(mom3t_hispanic == 1)
hispanic <- hispanic%>%
  select(White_Mom,Black_or_African_American_Mom,Pacific_Islander_Mom,Asian_Mom,American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Mom)%>%
  group_by(White_Mom,Black_or_African_American_Mom,Pacific_Islander_Mom,Asian_Mom,American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Mom)%>%
  summarise(count=n())
```

```{r , warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
BabyHispanic <- dat.f %>%
  filter(hispanic == "Yes, I am Hispanic or Latino")
  
Not_hispanic_baby <- dat.f %>%
  filter(mom3t_baby_hispanic == 1)
mom3t_baby_hispanic <- mom3t_baby_hispanic%>%
  
  select(American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Baby,Asian_Baby,Black_or_African_American_Baby,Pacific_Islander_Baby,White_Baby)%>%
 
   group_by(American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Baby,Asian_Baby,Black_or_African_American_Baby,Pacific_Islander_Baby,White_Baby)%>%
  summarise(count=n())
```

#new code for tables
#Mother hispanic
```{r , warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
Hispanic <- dat.f%>%
  select(test_id,mom3t_hispanic)%>%
  group_by(test_id,mom3t_hispanic)%>%
  filter(mom3t_hispanic == "Yes, I am Hispanic or Latino" )%>%
 filter(!is.na(mom3t_hispanic))%>%
  distinct(test_id)%>%
  group_by(mom3t_hispanic)%>%
  summarise(count=n())
```

#Mother not hipanic
```{r , warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
NotHispanic <- dat.f%>%

hispanic <- hispanic%>%
  select(White_Mom_Baby,Black_or_African_American_Mom_Baby,Pacific_Islander_Mom,Asian_Mom,American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Mom)%>%
  group_by(White_Mom,Black_or_African_American_Mom,Pacific_Islander_Mom,Asian_Mom,American_Indian_or_Native_Alaskan_Mom)%>%
  
  select(test_id,mom3t_hispanic)%>%
  group_by(test_id,mom3t_hispanic)%>%
  filter(mom3t_hispanic == "No, I am not Hispanic or Latino" )%>%
 filter(!is.na(mom3t_hispanic))%>%
  distinct(test_id)%>%
  group_by(mom3t_hispanic)%>%
  summarise(count=n())
```
